name: rss-monitor
description: Subscribe to, fetch, and monitor RSS/Atom feeds. Parse feed entries, track new items, and filter by keywords.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: rss_monitor
toolDefinition.description: Monitor RSS/Atom feeds. Subscribe to feeds, fetch latest entries, check for new items, and filter by keywords.

action.description: subscribe (add feed), unsubscribe (remove feed), fetch (get entries from a URL), list (show subscriptions), check (check all feeds for new items)
